Lyric:
[00:01.910]Beat It (Michael Jackson Cover - Raintime
[00:35.290]They told him don't you ever come around here
[00:38.030]Don't wanna see your face, you better disappear
[00:39.970]The fires in their eyes and their words are really clear
[00:44.270]So beat it, just beat it
[00:47.900]You better run, you better do what you can
[00:50.510]Don't wanna see no blood, don't be a macho man
[00:53.630]You wanna be tough, better do what you can
[00:56.560]So beat it, but you wanna be bad
[00:59.810]Just beat it, beat it, beat it, beat it
[01:03.240]No one wants to be defeated
[01:06.310]Showing how funky strong is your fighter
[01:09.920]It doesn't matter who's wrong or right
[01:12.420]Just beat it, beat it
[01:14.350]Just beat it, beat it
[01:16.100]Just beat it, beat it
[01:17.350]Just beat it, beat it
[01:19.540]They're out to get you, better leave while you can
[01:22.060]Don't wanna be a boy, you wanna be a man
[01:25.240]You wanna stay alive, better do what you can
[01:28.140]So beat it, just beat it
[01:32.080]You have to show them that you're really not scared
[01:34.700]You're playing with your life, this ain't no truth or dare
[01:37.750]They'll kick you, then they beat you,
[01:39.680]Then they'll tell you its fair
[01:41.370]So beat it, but you wanna be bad
[01:44.240]Just beat it, beat it, beat it, beat it

[01:53.740]It doesn't matter who's wrong or right
